feed.title: CUNY-nomic
feed.subtitle: The game Nomic played as part of the course on Programming and Hacking Communities.

entry.title: Minutes 2025-09-02
entry.content:
Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

09/02/2025, 2:00pm

Meeting Chair:
Jesse Dimino
Meeting Secretary:
Cesar Herrera

Present: Mikael Vejdemo Johansson (MVJ), Jonathan Hanon (JH), Olga Kliuchnik (OK), Beam, Heather Roberts (HR), Cesar Herrera (CH), Jesse Dimino (JD), Isa Jafarov (IJ) Absent: Cheng Ning (CN)

Meeting called to order at 2:53pm

Proposal for agenda:

  1. Review previous agenda
  2. Discuss Rule Changes

Item 1. Reviewing Previous Agenda

Agenda reveiwed

Item 2a. Pull Request #390

Motion by pull request by Beam to Create Rule 390

MVJ proposes amendment to strikeout last sentence MVJ amends his amendent to not strikeout and instead replace the last sentence with: “This minimum is 3”

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, OK, Beam, CH Nay: HR, IJ

The Amendment passes

Vote on motion Aye: Beam, HR, OK, IJ Nay: MVJ, JH, CH, JD

The motion fails

Point updates: Beam loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2b. Pull Request #391

Motion by pull request by OK to Create Rule 391

MVJ proposes amendment to change the short name of the rule from “Clarity Bonus” to “Jabberwocky”

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD Nay: IJ, OK, Beam, CH

The Amendment fails

CH proposes an amendment to crossout the second line item and the number 1 from the first

MVJ proposes second degree amendment is to remove the word Bonus from “Clarity Bonus”

Vote on second amendment Aye: Beam, OK, IJ, MVJ, JH, CH, JD Nay: HR

Second degree amendment is passed

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The amendment passes unanimously

JH proposes amendment to change “new rule” to “newly enacted, amended, or transmuted”

JH proposes second amendment from “newly enacted, amended, or transmuted” to “every new or changed rule”

Vote on second amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The second amendment passes unanimously

Vote on amendment Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The amendment passes unanimously

Vote on motion Aye: JD, CH, OK Nay: MVJ, JH, HR, IJ, Beam

The motion fails

Point updates: OK loses 10 points (Total: 0)

Item 2c. Pull Request #393

Motion by pull request by OK to Create Rule 393

MVJ proposes amended to strikeout line 4 (short name)

Aye: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH Nay:

The amendment passes unanimously

Aye: OK Nay: MVJ, JH, HR, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH

The motion fails

Point updates: OK loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2d. Pull Request #394

Motion by pull request by JD to Remove Rule 210

Aye: JD, IJ, Beam Nay: OK, MVJ, JH, HR, CH

The motion fails

Point updates: JD loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2e. Pull Request #395

Motion by pull request by HR to Create Rule 389 Vote to call to call to question passes

Aye: HR Nay: MVJ, JH, OK, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH

The motion fails

Point updates: HR loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2f. Pull Request #396

Motion by pull request by CH to Create Rule 394

Vote to call to call to question passes

Aye: CH, IJ, MVJ Nay: HR, JH, OK, JD, OK, Beam

The motion fails

Point updates: CH loses 10 points (Total: -10)

JD adjourns the meeting at 4:02 pm

Jesse Dimino
Meeting Secretary:

Aye: HR Nay: MVJ, JH, OK, JD, IJ, OK, Beam, CH

The motion fails

Point updates: HR loses 10 points (Total: -10)

Item 2f. Pull Request #396

Motion by pull request by CH to Create Rule 394

Vote to call to call to question passes

Aye: CH, IJ, MVJ Nay: HR, JH, OK, JD, OK, Beam

The motion fails

JD adjourns the meeting at 4:02 pm

entry.title: Minutes 2025-08-26
entry.content:
Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

8/26/2025, 2:00pm

Meeting Chair:
Mikael Vejdemo-Johansson
Meeting Secretary:
Jonathan Hanon
Present:
Mikael Vejdemo Johansson (MVJ), Jonathan Hanon (JH), Olga Kliuchnik (OK), Beam, Heather Roberts (HR), Cesar Herrera (CH), Jesse Dimino (JD)
Absent:
Cheng Ning (CN), Isa Jafarov (IJ)

Meeting called to order at 3:26pm

Proposal for agenda:

  1. Approving the agenda
  2. Propose and vote on rule changes
  3. New Business

Item 1. Approving the Agenda

Agenda moved by HR, seconded by JD

Agenda carries unanimously

Item 2a. Pull Request #87

Motion by pull request by MVJ to amend Rule 202

Aye: MVJ, JD Nay: JH, OK, MB, HR, CH

The motion fails.

Point updates: MVJ loses 10 (Total: -10)

Item 2b. Pull Request #88

Motion by pull request by JH to amend Rule 208

Aye: MVJ, JH, MB, HR, CH, JD Nay: OK

The motion carries with 6 out of 7 voting members present approving, making the approval worth 84 points.

Point updates: OK gains 10 points (Total: 10) JH gains 84 points (Total: 84)

Item 3. New Business

No new business introduced.

MVJ adjourns the meeting at 3:46pm
entry.summary: Minutes - Programming and Hacking Communities Meeting

entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.content:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

Jekyll requires blog post files to be named according to the following format:

YEAR-MONTH-DAY-title.MARKUP

Where YEAR is a four-digit number, MONTH and DAY are both two-digit numbers, and MARKUP is the file extension representing the format used in the file. After that, include the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
